dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S2213 IS: Background Check Completion Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenthal (for himself, Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Murphy, Ms. Warren, Mr. Durbin, Mrs. Gillibrand, Ms. Hirono, Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Reed, Mr. Kaine, and Mr. Cardin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit firearms dealers from selling a firearm prior to the completion of a background check.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Background Check Completion Act of 2015.
Section 922(t)(1)(B) of title 18, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking ; or and inserting ; and; and
